TBH this isnt NTR, this is more bittersweet drama. This is the kind of shit that happens when you aren't sure about your feelings and don't communicate sincerely with you SO. sucks but thats life for you, ppl aren't going to be waiting around for you to make up your mind sometimes.

(last) Ako apologies for what she was doing, but she stresses that she truly wants to be with Muroi and is over her lingering feelings for Sebata.
After hearing all that, Sebata walks away feeling like he got the short end of the stick in all of this, but initially shrugs it off. He's surprised at what Ako said, as apparently she never said it to him directly. Downcast, he recalls something from his past (probably their break-up) where Ako says, "You really aren't going to stop me... I knew it.... In the end, I was the only one serious about us!" He then recalls the moment that she confessed to him.

(3/3) During sex, Muroi asks how many times Ako fucked Sebata, she answers and is upset that he's upset about her saying Sebata's name previously, even though he said he wasn't. Muroi interrupts her with his ultimate concern: "Are you using sex with me to make you forget about Sebata?" Ako tries to leave, but Muroi refuses to let her go, saying that even if that's the case, he still wants to be with her. Eventually, Ako answers him. She really liked Sebata, but after they started dating, things just didn't mesh between them and she never felt like they were on the same page. The relationship felt very one-sided: she was in love with Sebata, but she never felt the same from him. Ako felt that she was the only one putting any effort into the relationship and started thinking that she never should have confessed to him. Muroi is the opposite: he's always there for her, he calls out her name during sex, he's open with how he feels about her.

(2/3) Sebata later finds that Ako and Muroi are dating; he's a little surprised as he didn't think he was her type. Muroi reveals to Sebata that Ako called out Sebata's name while they were having sex, which devastated Muroi. Muroi thinks up some ways of getting her over Sebata, including some kind of instigated argument to let everyone know where they stand, but Sebata thinks it's stupid. Sebata still goes to where they said they'll meet up, but Muroi starts having sex with Ako instead. While watching them fuck, Sebata recalls that he and Ako only tried sex once, but it was a common experience between virgins and ended unsuccessfully. He was surprised to see Ako so passionate during her sex with Muroi.

(1/3) Ako confessed to Sebata (MC). They dated from summer vacation until spring. Some time after that, Ako asks Sebata what's up with his friend Muroi being so annoying around her, wondering if Sebata put him up to harrasing the girl that he dumped (Sebata clarifies that HE didn't dump her). Sebata explains that Muroi let Sebata know that he wanted to go after Ako, saying that he's liked her for a while, even before she was dating Sebata. Sebata vouches for Muroi, though Ako claims she's done with romance for the time being. She asks how Sebata has been doing romantically, but he says she's the only one who has found him attractive. She suggests they start going out again, but then says she's just joking. Lastly, she says, "Hey Sebata... we really are broken up, aren't we...?"
Well that was a let down.

They broke up.She was the past girlfriend of the MC.Ex girlfriend got a new boyfriend (probs MC's friend.. not sure though as you can see they talk with eachother).She and the new boyfriend have hot sex at school.She gets addicted to him.MC regrets.The end.
